Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;teleporter core^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
I am in dire need of your assistance. ^orange;I need a teleporter core^reset; to finish my teleporter. You can craft one in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;.
Without teleporter cores, you won't be able to craft several useful technologies. Plus, teleporters are just plain ^green;fun^reset;!!!
